setting.name: FEXTOSC
setting.description: FEXTOSC External Oscillator mode Selection bits

option.description: EC (external clock) for 100 kHz to 8 MHz
option.name: ECM

option.description: XT (crystal oscillator) from 100 kHz to 4 MHz
option.name: XT

setting.name: RSTOSC
setting.description: Power-up default value for COSC bits

option.description: EXTOSC with 4x PLL, with EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits
option.name: EXT4X

option.description: CLKOUT function is disabled; I/O or oscillator function on OSC2
option.name: OFF

option.description: CLKOUT function is enabled; FOSC/4 clock appears at OSC2
option.name: ON

option.description: Writing to NOSC and NDIV is allowed
option.name: ON

option.description: The NOSC and NDIV bits cannot be changed by user software
option.name: OFF

option.description: MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR; Weak pull-up enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: MCLR/VPP pin function is digital input; MCLR internally disabled; Weak pull-up under control of port pin's WPU control bit.
option.name: OFF

option.description: WDT enabled while running and disabled while in SLEEP/IDLE; SWDTEN is ignored
option.name: SLEEP

option.description: WDT controlled by the SWDTEN bit in the WDTCON register
option.name: SWDTEN

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled, SBOREN bit ignored
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in Sleep; SBOREN is ignored
option.name: SLEEP

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled according to SBOREN
option.name: SBOREN

setting.name: PPS1WAY
setting.description: PPSLOCK bit One-Way Set Enable bit

option.description: The PPSLOCK bit can be cleared and set only once; PPS registers remain locked after one clear/set cycle
option.name: ON

option.description: The PPSLOCK bit can be set and cleared repeatedly (subject to the unlock sequence)
option.name: OFF

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will cause a Reset
option.name: ON

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will not cause a Reset
option.name: OFF

option.description: 0000h to 01FFh write-protected, 0200h to 07FFh may be modified
option.name: BOOT

option.description: 0000h to 03FFh write-protected, 0400h to 07FFh may be modified
option.name: HALF

option.description: 0000h to 07FFh write protected, no addresses may be modified
option.name: ALL

option.description: Low voltage programming enabled. MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR. MCLRE configuration bit is ignored.
option.name: ON

option.description: HV on MCLR/VPP must be used for programming.
option.name: OFF

setting.name: CP
setting.description: User NVM Program Memory Code Protection bit

setting.name: CPD
setting.description: Data NVM Memory Code Protection bit

option.name: 1-input D flip-flop with S and R
option.alias: 1-input D flip-flop with S and R

option.name: 1-input transparent latch with S and R
option.alias: 1-input transparent latch with S and R

setting.description: Logic Cell Output Polarity Control bit

setting.name: SMP
setting.description: SPI Data Input Sample Phase bit

setting.name: SSPM
setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Mode Select bits

setting.name: CKP
setting.description: SPI Clock Polarity Select bit/I2C Clock stretch

setting.name: RSEN
setting.description: : Repeated Start Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: PEN
setting.description: Stop Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: ACKEN
setting.description: Acknowledge Sequence Enable bit (Master Receive mode only)

setting.name: GCEN
setting.description: General Call Enable bit (Slave mode only)

setting.name: AHEN
setting.description: Address Hold Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SBCDE
setting.description: Slave mode Bus Collision Detect Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SDAHT
setting.description: SDA Hold Time selection bit (I2C mode only)

setting.name: ACKTIM
setting.description: Acknowledge Time Status bit (I2C Slave mode only)
